trivia_items.text: Her name is obviously a reference to the musical instrument of the same name that is generally associated with Scotland, not Ireland.
The mythological creature in her Elite 2 artwork is likely the lindworm, which is note by its serpentine body.
Bagpipe's pole is most likely based on the Gunlance in the Monster Hunter series with the elements of the Milkor MGL grenade launcher.
Bagpipe's dialogue is spoken in Hokkaido-ben. In English, it would be equivalent to Scottish English.
Bagpipe is the only Vouivre without a visible tail. (Her tail however is shown if she's wearing her Queen No. 1 outfit)
